@zou3519 IMHO, the circular reference is itself memory leak, even if it is not something special in python. I think gc just collect memory leak.

However, whatever we call it, the circular reference make garbages and it causes run of garbage collector. It bring down the training performance (significantly in my case). Therefore if we can correct it, we should do that. But if it come from python 2.7 internally as you said, I should move to the python 3 :) I'll try it.
